channel.title: Windows cannot find 'Javaw'
channel.description:
This is the Error message i receive: Windows cannot find 'Javaw'. Make sure you have typed the name correctly, then try again.
My java version is jdk1.6.20 I have changed my User Variables to the one's below.
I have set my CLASS to : CLASS:C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
And my PATH to : PATH:C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin
In my System Variables i have set my PATH to this.
System Variable PATH:c:\windows\system32

item.title: Windows cannot find 'Javaw'

And my PATH to :
PATH:C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin

In my System Variables i have set my PATH to this.

Maybe wrong on the compiler
